Entry.EnglishText: Just what is the Queen going to do at the ritual...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 確か、お披露目の儀式があるって 話だったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: They did say it was supposed to be an inauguration ceremony, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王の口振りだと、ただそれだけって わけじゃなさそうだったよな。
Entry.EnglishText: From the way the Queen was talking, I don't think that's the only thing she's doing.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうせ、ろくでもない事を考えてるんだろ？ 儀式前にクレアさんを取り戻さなくちゃな！
Entry.EnglishText: Anyway, she's got to be up to no good, right? We have to get Claire back before the ritual!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……無事でいてくれ……
